meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Head Lloyd Baum Drew Horwood Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6559.

td.p: Jennifer Head, an archivist for the Sisters of Charity from Dubuque, Iowa
Lloyd Baum, an insurance specialist from Long Beach, New York
Drew Horwood, a business analyst from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,199)

tr.td: THE 18th CENTURY
SINGERS PORTRAYED ON FILM
OYSTER STEW
LONDON TRANSPORTATION
LETTERS & WORDS
MARYLAND
